import sys

n, p = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
distances = sorted(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

#print n, p, distances

max_distance = max(distances)

min_distance = max_distance

for i in range(len(distances)):
	if distances[i] <= (i+1)*p:
		min_distance = min(min_distance, distances[i])
	else:
		break

print min_distance

def main():
    n, p = map(int, input().split())
    distances = list(map(int, input().split()))
    distances.sort()
    print(min([distances[i] - distances[i-1] for i in range(1, n)]))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#=============================CODE=================================
#==================================================================


import sys

def main():
    input = sys.stdin.readline().split()
    n = int(input[0])
    p = int(input[1])
    input = sys.stdin.readline().split()
    cars = [int(i) for i in input]
    cars.sort()
    #print(cars)
    min_dist = cars[0]
    for i in range(1, n):
        if cars[i] - cars[i-1] < min_dist:
            min_dist = cars[i] - cars[i-1]
    print(min_dist)

main()
